description:
Hyoh`s evil fighting spiritual energy has vanished! But his memories haven`t completely returned. His mind clouded with memories of his childhood departure from Kenshiro, Hyoh turns his fist upon Kenshiro once more. Shachi senses danger and finally acts. As Kenshiro catches a glimpse of tears in Hyoh`s eyes, his fist slackens, and to save him, he rushes Hyoh from behind! Then the defeated Hyoh says something unexpected...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les deux frères se retrouvent ! Kenshiro je t`attendais !!
Tearful Reunion of the Brothers! Kenshiro, I`ve Been Waiting for You!!
涙の兄弟再会! ケンシロウ, 俺はお前を待っていた!!
